content: Laurel Buds are one of the Soaks you can get for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. Found a little deeper into the game, it has a rather powerful buff, which can save your life in a fight or against a tough enemy.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Laurel_Buds.md', within the main section titled 'Laurel Buds'.
The content is as follows:
Laurel Buds are one of the Soaks you can get for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. Found a little deeper into the game, it has a rather powerful buff, which can save your life in a fight or against a tough enemy.
